page.title: 02Our School
page.content: Our school is Balmerino School.It is actually in Gauldry.The school is in two separate parts,one containing the P1 and 2 room and the P3,4 and 5 room and the other containing the P6 and 7 room,the music room,the staff,room and WC,the pupils toilets,the cloakroom and the lunch and television room.The latter is the original building which is built of stone.The former is a more modern building built of wood.There are 60 children and 3 teachers in the school.Mrs.Jack teaches P1 and 2.Mrs. Scott teaches P3,4 and 5 and Mrs. Balfour,the Headmistress,teaches P6 and 7.At the end of 84'P6 and 7 went to see The Golden Hinde when it was in Edinburgh.P6 and 7 play a lot of golf, hockey,and swimming with the school.
